image.caption: Dip into the infinity pool at Travaasa Hāna’s Sea Ranch Cottages.
Like nowhere else on earth – kayaking at Hāna Bay.

page.title: Experiences

meta.pageTitle: Travaasa: Providing a Wide Range of Experiences
meta.description: Enrich your mind, stretch your imagination, feed your psyche with different experiences.
meta.keywords: Travaasa, experiences, spa, offerings, classes, programs

page.copy: At Travaasa, we provide a wide range of experiences to enrich your mind, stretch your imagination, feed your psyche, move your body and spa-ify your visage. We call our diverse offerings "Travaasas."
page.imageCaption: Customize your Travaasa experience any way you want.

page.title: Adventure

meta.description: Travaasa adventure offerings are exciting and stimulating with water sports, hikes, equine experiences and challenge courses.
meta.keywords: adventure, equine, hiking, hike, challenge course, climbing wall, travaasa

page.copy: Travel is an adventure, and it’s only fitting that since Travaasa is all about the magic of the journey, that our Adventure offerings are designed to thrill and delight. (It doesn’t hurt that they take place in drop-dead gorgeous settings, either). Travaasa celebrates the great outdoors with adventurous fun and stimulating play that take off the tether from technology and bring back the simple pleasures of reconnecting with the outside world and the natural wonders that surround us.
page.imageCaption: Travel should be an adventure.

page.title: Culinary

meta.description: Travaasa culinary offers a range of classes, from basic culinary skills and advice on making healthy choices at the market to new recipes steeped in local tradition.
meta.keywords: culinary, cooking, food, nutrition, healthy, travaasa

page.copy: Our culinary Travassas are tailored for each location, so you’ll always encounter something unique no matter where you journey. One thing that is a constant, however, is that you’ll always experience locally sourced, organic food and recipes or tasting events that feature dishes native to that region.
page.imageCaption: Cooking demos that will set your palate on fire.

page.title: Culture

meta.description: Travaasa culture classes focus on creative expression, nature, conversation and dance.
meta.keywords: travaasa, culture

page.copy: This is your time to explore the world so you can come home richer for having learned new skills, heard other’s stories and immersed yourself in creative outlets that let your soul soar. This is your time to allow for serendipitous moments that refresh, renew and challenge. This is your time to learn how to Travaasa.
page.imageCaption: Explore the world with our Culture Travaasas.

page.title: Fitness

meta.description: Travaasa fitness focuses on balance, core work and flexibility.
meta.keywords: fitness, strengthening, balance, core, flexibility, agile, strength, travaasa

page.copy:
Strengthening the body is as important as keeping our brain cells active, fueling your inner muse and letting your spirit soar. Oh, and having a good time along the way is also key. Our fitness Travaasas focus on balance, core work and flexibility—so throw your clunky shoes off and let your agile inner child shine. We’ll pump up your heart so you can practically feel the good health coursing through your veins.

We’re not promising miracles, but we just bet you’ll leave here feeling new strength in muscles you didn’t even know you had.
page.imageCaption: Let your inner agile child shine with our Fitness Travaasas.

page.title: Spa & Wellness

meta.description: Travaasa spa workshops include meditation, stretch, posture and breath work.
meta.keywords: wellness, meditation, stretch, health, workshops, travaasa, spa

page.copy: Wellness is a well-rounded thing. A balanced state of mind coupled with a managed stress life, a healthy body and a satisfied soul gives focus and a point of view to our lives. We achieve that through meditation, stretch, yoga, posture and breath work. Not to mention stimulating health-oriented consultations that will pique your curiosity. Think of these workshops as a wellness toolkit you’ll be able to refer to again and again after you leave here.
page.imageCaption: These Travaasas are like a wellness toolkit.

page.title: Adventure

meta.description: Travaasa adventure offerings are exciting and stimulating with water sports, hikes, equine experiences and challenge courses.
meta.keywords: adventure, equine, hiking, hike, challenge course, climbing wall, travaasa

page.copy: Travel is an adventure, and it’s only fitting that since Travaasa is all about the magic of the journey, that our Adventure offerings are designed to thrill and delight. (It doesn’t hurt that they take place in drop-dead gorgeous settings, either). Travaasa celebrates the great outdoors with adventurous fun and stimulating play that take off the tether from technology and bring back the simple pleasures of reconnecting with the outside world and the natural wonders that surround us.
page.imageCaption: Travel should be an adventure.

page.title: Prickly Pear Challenge Course (Austin)

meta.description: A state-of-the-art course at Travaasa Austin, designed in partnership with Outward Bound Professional and incorporates vertical climbing elements for all levels of physical ability.
meta.keywords: travaasa, challenge, course, prickly, pear, outward bound, climbing, austin

page.copy:
Ever picked a prickly pear? If you have, you know the importance of each foot and hand placement as you find your way between the cactus needles. The same focus on movement is required as you navigate the space above the trees on our challenge course. Our state-of-the-art course was designed in partnership with Outward Bound Professional, and incorporates vertical climbing elements for a wide range of physical ability. Begin at the Cob Web, progress over Raider Bridge, through the Flying V, to navigate Double Trouble. The linear progression of the course culminates with a fantastic flight of over 250 feet long, soaring over the tree tops.

Climbing Wall

Ready to feel exhilarated and have a real sense of accomplishment that you did something out of your comfort zone? Our climbing wall at the Prickly Pear Challenge Course will entertain and test both first timers and experienced climbers alike. You’ll love the feeling of challenging yourself to reach new heights while daring yourself to trust your body and go beyond your (perceived) limitations.

Zipline

There's no other feeling like that of a zip line—the sensation of flying and the freedom afforded by your journey down the cable—is at once exhilarating and empowering. At Travaasa Austin, the linear progression of our course culminates with a fantastic dual zip line flight over 250 feet long, soaring above the tree tops.

Partner Overview: Outward Bound

For more than 60 years, Outward Bound has proven that they are simply the best at what they do as the premier adventure-based education program in the world. Most people know that Outward Bound has a nationwide system of wilderness courses, community-centric and special programming, but many may not be familiar with the Outward Bound Professional program, whose goal is to create positive, lasting change in the workplace through innovative, customized programs that enhance the effectiveness of individuals, groups and organizations. Travaasa celebrates our partnership with this revered leader in experiential learning and discovery.
page.imageCaption: Our state-of-the-art challenge course.

page.title: Stand Up Paddling (Hāna)

meta.description: Stand Up Paddling has a rich Hawaiian heritage.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, Hawaiian, heritage, SUP, water sport, popular, cross-athletes, core workout, balance, fitness, Hāna Bay.

page.copy: Hoe he’e nalu, or Stand Up Paddling (SUP) has a rich Hawaiian heritage that is re-emerging as a popular water sport around the world. It is very popular with cross-athletes and provides a strong core workout, promotes balance and general fitness. Not to mention that it’s a fun way to view the beautiful natural surroundings of Hāna Bay.

page.title: Archery (Austin)

meta.description: Archery boosts mental and physical health and fitness.
meta.keywords: travaasa, archery, austin

page.copy: Learn the fundamentals that create the foundation of archery while boosting your mental attention and connecting your breath to physical performance. Experience techniques to develop your focus, patience, flexibility, concentration, and attention skills and understand why great archers continually develop these simple concepts to heighten all aspects of their lives.
page.imageCaption: Archery develops focus, patience, flexibility and concentration.

page.title: Equine (Hāna)

meta.description: Reconnect with your innate instinctual intelligence through working with horses.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, equine, experiences, horses, paniolo, alakai, cowboy, tour leader.

page.copy:
Signature Experience

A deep connection with nature and plants and animals is a Hawaiian tradition. At our stables, you’ll learn to lead and project your intensions as you are guided by our equine team. No previous horse experience needed for this Travaasa that will teach you how to establish communication with another being through respect, sensitivity and awareness.

Trail Rides

Hawaiian cowboys or paniolo’s have ridden the remote and unspoiled slopes, plains and coastline for over 175 years. And there is nothing quite like enjoying the superb, natural beauty of Maui on Hāna’s extensive trail system. You’ll be accompanied by an Alaka’i, or trained tour leader, who will share stories of the land and its people. No previous horse experience needed.

page.title: Equine Experiences (Austin)

meta.description: Reconnect with your innate instinctual intelligence through working with horses.
meta.keywords: travaasa, equine, experience, horses, austin

page.copy:
Signature Experience

Develop your self-awareness through close interaction with this intelligent creature and allow our equine team to guide you on a journey of heightened personal understanding. No previous horse experience needed.

Basic Experience

Learn to lead and project your intensions as you are guided by our equine team. No previous horse experience needed for this Travaasa that will teach you how to establish communication with another being through respect, sensitivity and awareness.

Sunrise Walk

There's nothing like a Hill Country sunrise and there is no better place to view it then Travaasa’s extensive trail system. Awaken the body and get ready to start your experience as you breath in the fresh morning air and watch the sun rise over the terrain and Lake Travis.

Sunset Walk

Watch the sunset while you spend time with your new equine friends at the stable. This evening hike will allow you to reflect on the amazing day you had at Travaasa Austin.
page.imageCaption: Let our equine team guide you on a journey of heightened personal understanding.

page.title: Snorkeling (Hāna)

meta.description: Maui is a snorkeler’s paradise and Hāna Bay holds some of the island’s best coral heads.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, snorkeling, Maui, Hāna Bay, sea sports, adventure, tropical fish

page.copy: Maui is by far the most popular snorkeling island in Hawai'i. You’ll snorkel off the beach of Kapueokahi, or Hāna Bay in a protected cove teeming with tropical fish and living coral gardens in amazing shapes and colors. Enjoy this snorkeler’s paradise, and after your first glimpse of what lies beneath the ocean’s surface, you might just become hooked on this breathtaking experience.
page.imageCaption: Let our equine team guide you on a journey of heightened personal understanding.

page.title: Hiking (Austin)

meta.description: Explore Travaasa's rich and extensive trail system during morning, evening and moonlight hikes.
meta.keywords: travaasa, hiking, trail, ecology, austin

page.copy:
Hill Country Hike

Even if you don’t think you’re into hiking, you’ll change your mind after you explore our rich and extensive trail system. If you take a guided tour, you’ll learn about local flora, fauna and the history and ecology of the area. Hikes are open to all and accommodate a wide range of interests and abilities. Wear comfortable, supportive shoes and bring water. We have morning, evening and moonlight hikes.

Sunrise Hike

There's something magical about starting your day with a sunrise hike. Your body is refreshed from sleep, and your mind is open to experiencing new and vital things. Feel the fresh morning air on your face and watch the sun rise over the breathtaking landscape of the Balcones Canyonlands and waterscape of Lake Travis.
page.imageCaption: Our rich and extensive trail system.

page.title: Walks (Hāna)

meta.description: Explore coastal walks that lets you experience native plants in this place of great beauty, or walk to Hamoa Beach.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, Hamoa Beach, canoe plants, coastal walk, Jame Michener, Dr. Beach, foliage, waves, boogie boarding, ocean, Pele, Goddess of Fire, mo olelo, ‘Ālau Island.

page.copy:
Waipāuma Coastal Walk

Start your morning with a coastal walk you’ll remember for the rest of your life. Our guides will point out various native plants (as well as “canoe plants,” plants that were brought to Hawai’i by the first Polynesians over 1,300 years ago to ensure their survival). You’ll also see the picturesque ‘Ālau Island, a bird sanctuary with an unbelievable grouping of wind-tossed palm trees at its summit. Many of our guides were raised in Hāna, and will share their own personal mo‘olelo (stories) of growing up in this place of great beauty.

Walk to Hamoa Beach

A three-mile walk from the hotel, Hamoa Beach is a broad curve of untouched sand described by the late Pulitzer Prize winner James Michener as “The most perfect crescent beach in the Pacific.” Sheltered by lush foliage on its western side, this is a not-to-be-missed beach with perfect waves for boogie boarding* and the trademark indigo Hawaiian ocean with patches of bright, vivid clear blue. The walk takes you past the famous Ka-iwi-o-Pele hill which is said to hold the bones of Pele, Goddess of Fire (and the Hawaiian Volcano Goddess), and broad ranchland with free-roaming cows and egrets. Spectacular views in every direction, with the end of your journey, Hamoa Beach, being a real showstopper.

page.title: Geocaching Adventure (Austin)

meta.description: A game of high-tech hide and seek using a GPS receiver to hide and search out containers.
meta.keywords: travaasa, geocaching, gps, austin

page.copy: Geocaching is an outdoor sporting activity, often described as a “game of high-tech hide & seek,” in which the participants use a Global Positioning System (GPS) receiver or other navigational techniques to hide and search out containers, called “geocaches” or “caches” anywhere in the world. And in your case, you’ll have the entire spectacular Travaasa property to explore—discovering and hiding your own caches.
page.imageCaption: Geocaching - high-tech meets hide 'n seek.

page.title: Challenge Course (Hāna)

meta.description: Enjoy an empowering mission and tackle physical challenges that help you discover hidden strengths and break free of self-imposed limitations.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, Outward Bound, leap, balance, adventure, zipline

page.copy:
Travaasa, in partnership with Outward Bound Professional, is creating a challenge course designed to push you to the limits of your personal comfort zone (and beyond). It’s at this edge you’ll discover untapped reserves of strength and experience the sublime empowerment of overcoming what once seemed beyond you. We look forward to joining you on a thrilling adventure for both mind and body.

Coming to Travaasa Hāna in winter 2011-2012!

page.title: Culinary

meta.description: Travaasa culinary offers a range of classes, from basic culinary skills and advice on making healthy choices at the market to new recipes steeped in local tradition.
meta.keywords: culinary, cooking, food, nutrition, healthy, travaasa

page.copy: Our culinary Travassas are tailored for each location, so you’ll always encounter something unique no matter where you journey. One thing that is a constant, however, is that you’ll always experience locally sourced, organic food and recipes or tasting events that feature dishes native to that region.
page.imageCaption: Cooking demos that will set your palate on fire.

page.title: Fish Preparation (Hāna)

meta.description: Debunk the myths and discover everything you need to prepare and enjoy delicious fish dishes at home.
meta.keywords: : travaasa, Hāna, hana, fish, fish preparation, prepare fish, nutritious, culinary, cooking, demystify, ocean, tradition, experience, chef, recipe

page.copy: Fish is nutritious and delicious, yet many people are reluctant to attempt preparing a fish course at home. This culinary experience will help demystify cooking with fish, giving you knowledge about how to select, buy, clean, store and prepare it. We’ll honor the ocean’s bounty through a range of simple and versatile techniques and explore Hawaii’s culinary heritage and fish traditions. You’ll watch, experience, and taste as our Chef walks you through the preparation of three different fish recipes.

page.title: Basic Culinary Skills (Austin)

meta.description: Cooking demos that teach you skills and techniques while showcasing Travaasa house recipes. A four-part series in terminology, eggs, knife skills and sauces.
meta.keywords: travaasa, cooking, culinary, skills, class, terminology, eggs, knife, sauces, AUSTIN

page.copy:
Our hands-on cooking demos will teach you skills and techniques while showcasing Travaasa house recipes. Let our gourmet culinary team delight you, on property, with ways to prepare, cook and present the cuisine you savor.

Choose one, or take all three:

  • Eggs (everything you've always wanted to know about the multitalented egg)
  • Knife Skills: Tips, Tricks & Techniques
  • Stocks and Sauces
page.imageCaption: Hands-on cooking demos.

page.title: Juicing 2.0 (Hāna)

meta.description: Use whole foods to blend and mix fresh juices, soups, dips and more.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, dips, soups, juices, salsas, spreads, desserts, Hawai'i, juicing, fruits, vegetables, bounty.

page.copy: If ever there was a more ideal place to for you to try juicing, Hawai’i is the place. The rich and varied bounty of fruits and vegetables lets you whip up a nearly endless list of creations. But this isn’t ‘old school’ blending filled with chopping, slopping and mopping here. This is Juicing 2.0 Hāna style. Together, we’ll use whole foods to blend and mix fresh juices, soups, dips, spreads, desserts and salsas.

page.title: Tastings (Austin)

meta.description: An education for your palate that includes tastings of regional foods, organic wines, handcrafted beers and artisanal delicacies.
meta.keywords: travaasa, tasting, palate, regional, organic, education, delicacies, wine, austin

page.copy:
Sip. Surrender. Savor. Plunge into the Travaasa Tastings and give your palate an education unlike any other. Discover the subtle nuances between olive oils, the zip and tang of barbecue sauces, decadent chocolates and the rich ripeness of artisanal cheeses. And of course, there’s the whole world of beverages ready to delight in: aromatic coffees, handcrafted beers, tea flights, spirits from craft distillers and even the differences in coconut milks. And your experience wouldn’t be complete without exploring the many, many flavors of regional cuisines.

Wines (Austin)

Wine appreciation can sound daunting and complicated. Let us step in with this Travaasa that “undaunts” and underscores all the important things you need to know and understand about enjoying wine. First of all, wine is not just about knowing what you like. There is a difference between objective quality and subjective enjoyment. So let yourself surrender to different tastes you might never get to experience again.

We'll start with the bottle itself. Much of the magic of wine lies in being able to properly evaluate bottles, which in turn can lead to an understanding of wine's history and origins. Then we'll move on to learning the skill of wine appreciation by tasting and evaluating wines with experts in the field (top wines can come from many regions, but they all have certain characteristics in common). You'll learn how to analyze the various flavors, aromas and textures of grapes, and you'll have a chance to taste quality wines, which will be provided along with water and appropriate snacks.
page.imageCaption: As we always say, the educated palate is a happy (and satisfied) palate.

page.title: The Art of the Cocktail (Hāna)

meta.description: Go far beyond a shot and a beer to discover the depth of flavors and surging creativity that makes spirits sing and elevates mixology to art.
meta.keywords: : travaasa, Hāna, hana, hawaii, cocktail, mixology, lounge, bar, aperitif, specialty, after-dinner, sophistication, creativity, bartender, mai thai, martini, muddle

page.copy: We are in a mixology renaissance. More and more lounges, bars and restaurants are offering lists of aperitifs, specialty cocktails and after-dinner drinks that sparkle with sophistication and creativity. So the bartender’s trick is how best to combine juices, purees, fruits, spices and wonderful fresh ingredients to develop seductive new offerings and reinvigorate the classics we all know and love. Find out why the Mai Thai is synonymous with Hawaii. (Or is it?) The difference between a martini shaken or stirred. Discover what a muddle is and why you would use it. Join us as we embark on a tasting journey, learning how quintessential old-world recipes have morphed in search of the complex, layered flavors that create today’s savory new trends.

page.title: Having Fun in the Kitchen (Austin)

meta.description: Cooking demos that teach you skills and techniques while showcasing Travaasa house recipes. A three-part series dealing with appetizers, cocktails and irresistible recipes.
meta.keywords: travaasa, cooking, appetizers, cocktails, recipes, austin

page.h1: Having Fun in the Kitchen - 3 Parts (Austin)
page.copy:
You know those enviable people who make entertaining look so easy, and preparing recipes so effortless? After this culinary adventure, you’ll be one of them as you whip up tempting appetizers, perfect the art of the cocktail and learn how to create a memorable meal through layering different tastes and textures.

Choose one, or take all three:

  • Three Memorable & Easy Appetizers
  • The Art of the Cocktail
  • A Dinner Your Guests Will Talk About
page.imageCaption: Have fun in the kitchen with Chef Ben.

page.title: Tastings Series (Hāna)

meta.description: Rotating sessions to educate your palette to the nuance of food and beverage.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, palette, educate, guava, coconut water, coconut milk, gourmet chocolate, locally grown, coffee, artisanal cheese, beer, tea flights.

page.copy: These rotating sessions will take you on a wonderful voyage of culinary discovery. On any given week you may be offered the opportunity to explore and enjoy the flavors of guava, coconut water (milk), gourmet chocolate, locally grown coffee, artisanal cheese, wine, beer, or tea flights.

page.title: Juicing 2.0 (Austin)

meta.description: The Travaasa Juicing 2.0 program is a hands-on, experiential class that provides a novel way to discover the exciting possibilities of food.
meta.keywords: travaasa, nutrition, palette, grocery, shopping, healthy, juicing, nourish, austin

page.copy:
Most have tried juicing before. And promptly quit because of the slopping, mopping and chopping. Enter our Juicing 2.0 Travaasa. This isn't juicing from another era.

Instead, we bring you an interactive meal-making program that uses a blender and fresh, whole food as its culinary crayon box. This is a hands-on, experiential class that provides a novel way to discover the exciting possibilities of food. We use whole foods to blend, juice and mix into fresh whole juices, hot soups, ice cream, salsas, dips, spreads and desserts... all from scratch. And all delicious.
page.imageCaption: Juicing like you've never tasted before.

page.title: Healthy Regional Cuisine (Hāna)

meta.description: Discover the flavors that make Hawaii a paradise for creating delicious, healthy cuisine.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, hawaii, hawaiian cuisine, hawaiian flavors, fusion cuisine, fusion, gourmet, paradise, locally sourced

page.copy: Modern Hawaiian cuisine is a fusion of many diverse ethnic flavors brought to the islands by immigrants throughout the region’s rich history. The island is paradise for gourmets, with abundant fruits and vegetables grown from rich volcanic soil, a wide variety of high quality, fresh fish and locally sourced cattle. Here you’ll learn about Hawaii's many food staples and try your hand at some of our most revered local dishes.

page.title: Nutrition (Austin)

meta.description: The Travaasa nutrition series offers food for health and wellness and educating the palette.
meta.keywords: travaasa, nutrition, palette, grocery, shopping, healthy, juicing, nourish, austin

page.copy:
Food, glorious food. It nourishes, delights and is the focus of many of our social gatherings. Our delicious Nutrition Series is designed to help you understand the importance of developing your palette, filling your body with health through juicing, navigating the marketplace and more.

Acclimating the Palette

When you are hungry, what do you crave? The number one behavioral reason we choose to eat something is taste. It is a primal force. Training taste is no different than training your muscles or your mind. In this Travaasa, we show you how to acclimate your palette while we take you on a sensory trek that goes beyond base camp to elevate your tastes to higher ground and, better health. And along the way we'll also explore edible plants that many of us aren't even aware of (there are actually over a hundred thousand).

Nourish Flourish

Rejuvenation, enrichment, metamorphisis, vitality. Food serves it all. Plants sprout, grow, produce, harvest and nourish all so we can flourish: by eating well and fresh. Developing an awareness within our modern world of the impact embodied in our consumption, and the ecological production of what we eat, is an invigorating inquiry. Across the spectrum of health, wellness and fitness, food offers vital performance for everyone—discover how you can flourish from all the nourishing foods available to us.

Navigating the Market

Shopping for groceries has turned into a treasure hunt. The clues, maps, symbols and signs that lead you to eat well—live, fresh food are there to be discovered. Revealing blind spots and demystifying hidden market secrets will help you navigate the deep waters of food processing and packaging. Consider this as a brighter way into defining ingredients. Your awareness alone immediately translates into discernable action.
page.imageCaption: Food, glorious food.

page.title: Dinner Party 101 (Hāna)

meta.description: Get inspired for your next gathering with quick, unique recipes everyone will love.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, entertaining, dinner party, potluck, party dish, party recipe, quick recipe, easy recipe

page.copy: Have guests coming over and don't know what to make? Headed to a party and want to bring something different than the same old standard dish you always bring? Join our culinary team and learn three quick and easy (but unique) dishes that will have your friends asking, "Where you'd get that recipe?"

page.title: Healthy Regional Cuisine (Austin)

meta.description: Cooking demos that teach you skills and techniques while showcasing Travaasa house recipes. A three-part series dealing with Mediterranean, Asian and Caribbean cuisines.
meta.keywords: travaasa, cooking, regional, mediterranean, asian, caribbean, recipes, austin

page.copy:
Travaasa is a journey, and there's a whole world of regional cuisines out there to explore. This is a gastronomic exploration that takes you from east to west and south with flavors that will excite, ignite and surprise.

Choose one, or take all three:

  • Mediterranean
  • Asian
  • Caribbean
page.imageCaption: Explore a world of regional cuisines.

page.title: Culture

meta.description: Travaasa culture classes focus on creative expression, nature, conversation and dance.
meta.keywords: travaasa, culture

page.copy: This is your time to explore the world so you can come home richer for having learned new skills, heard other’s stories and immersed yourself in creative outlets that let your soul soar. This is your time to allow for serendipitous moments that refresh, renew and challenge. This is your time to learn how to Travaasa.
page.imageCaption: Explore the world with our Culture Travaasas.

page.title: Texas Two-Step (Austin)

meta.description: Travaasa teaches Texas Two-Step for fun and enrichment.
meta.keywords: travaasa, texas, two-step, dance, austin

page.copy: The Texas Two Step includes three steps: a quick step, a quick step, and then a slow step. The lead steps forward on his left foot, lifting his right heel for the first step, which is the first quick step. It can be danced to music with either a 2/4 or 4/4 time signature. And best of all? It doesn’t have to be done just in Texas, which means you’ve got a whole new skill to show off to friends when you go home, or a new weekend get-together idea.
page.imageCaption: The best place to learn the Texas Two-Step? Texas.

page.title: Hawaiian "Throw Net" (Hāna)

meta.description: Learn how to do traditional Hawaiian throw net in the hopes of catching a fish.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, throw net, Hawaiian, fish, generations, handmade, traveler, ocean, oHāna.

page.copy: Hawaiian “throw net” has been passed on from generation to generation in Hawai’i, and handmade nets are becoming family heirlooms (easy to see why when you see a handmade net and inspect the intricate interweaving of strands). You, intrepid traveler, will be learning how to throw a net into Hāna Bay, in the hopes of catching a fish, but every day native Hawaiians throw net to catch dinner to share with their ‘oHāna. You’ll be surprised how easily you’ll catch on to readying the net to cast, and how fun it is to throw a perfect net into the ocean, pull it in and discover…

page.title: Evening Fireside Chats (Austin)

meta.description: : A comforting and convivial way to complete your evening Travaasa-style through fireside chats with other guests.
meta.keywords: travaasa, fire, fireside, firepit, chat, austin

page.copy: At Travaasa Austin, we want to offer you a comforting and convivial way to end the evening. Around our firepit (outside) or fireside (inside) a nightly gathering as guests talk, laugh and share the day’s memories. It’s a friendly environment that allows you to get to know your fellow guests and the staff a little bit better. Whatever we do, whether it’s sharing stories, roasting marshmallows, or an impromptu music jam, every night will be a little bit different and a whole lot of fun.
page.imageCaption: Enjoy a nightly gathering around our fire pit.

page.title: Hula (Hāna)

meta.description: Every hula tells a story and you’ll learn the hand and foot movements that go along with telling it.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, hula, story, cultural guides, teacher, childhood, generation, dance, traditions, aina, kai.

page.copy: Every hula tells a story, and you’ll learn all the graceful hand and foot movements that go along with telling it. Hula is more than just a dance—it is something that links Hawaiians to ‘Āina (land) and Kai (ocean) and in broader terms, to the story of life. Hula is traditionally a way that stories and traditions were passed from generation to generation. Originally, hula was danced by men, but now it is performed by both men and women. You’ll learn a story from one of our cultural guides, your kumu (teacher) who’s been practicing hula since childhood.

page.title: Bike Holoholo (Hāna)

meta.description: Take a bike cruise like no other as we explore Hāna's gorgeous terrain and discover its culture.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, bike, holoholo, journey, tour, local, bicycle

page.copy: Holoholo loosely translates to cruising, and there is no place to cruise like Hāna. Join us for a fun bike excursion as we visit a handful of local sites while learning about land use, culture, history and stewardship. You’ll become acquainted with Hāna’s sugar plantation days, understand the diversity of plants, connect with the architecture, re-live festivals and get a closer look at local town life.

page.title: Sketch, Draw, Paint (Austin)

meta.description: Unleash your creative self at Travaasa with sketching, drawing and painting classes.
meta.keywords: travaasa, sketch, draw, paint, austin

page.copy: It’s been said that within each of us is a creative being just longing to get out. At Travaasa, we believe that. That’s why we offer you pressure-free ways to release your inner creative and focus your soul through your choice of artistic outlet. Best of all? No experience or talent is needed to create something amazing that you can bring home to remind you of your Travaasa journey.
page.imageCaption: Let your creativity shine.

page.title: Photography (Hāna)

meta.description: Get the most out of every photographic shot with our hands-on tutoring.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, DSLR camera buff, photographers, rule of thirds, professional portraits, landscapes, photos, tutoring.

page.copy:
Capture Your Journey

Cerulean blue water. Iridescent beds of flowers. A loved one attempting to master stand up paddling. Expand your power of the point-and-shoot or SLR digital camera and unleash your inner photographer. In this basic photography class, receive hands-on tutoring covering the general anatomy and hidden functions of your individual cameras. You will leave more knowledgeable about the ins and outs of photography, armed with tried and true professional techniques for composing better images.

Landscape: Challenging Your Creative Eye

Visiting Hāna is definitely the time and place to take your photography to the next level. Capture the landscape around you like a pro and hone your digital camera creativity in this more advanced class. Learn how photographers use white balance, natural and artificial lightning, the rule of thirds and the golden mean to create professional looking landscape images.

page.title: Lei Making (Hāna)

meta.description: Leis are used to celebrate all occasions in Hawai’I, and you’ll learn lei-making techniques in our classes.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, lei, Plumeria, classes, techniques, blooms, Ti Leaf, Kukui Nut, lei wili, lei hili, lei kui pololei.

page.copy: You were probably charmed by the Ti leaf lei adorned with Plumeria blooms you received upon arrival, or maybe you’re still wearing the Kukui Nut lei we gave you. Learn how to make your own Ti leaf lei, or string Plumeria blooms for a colorful, wonderfully scented lei. Leis are traditionally used to celebrate all occasions in Hawai’i, and we have a variety of classes where you can learn different techniques, from lei wili (twisting), lei hili (braiding), lei kui pololei (strung with a needle) and more.

page.title: Learning Harmonica (Austin)

meta.description: The harmonica allows the musically challenged to learn how to create music within a few hours.
meta.keywords: travaasa, harmonica, music, austin

page.copy: Not just for cowhands, the harmonica allows the musically challenged to begin enjoying the benefits of music within just a few hours. You do not have to know how to read music to begin playing the harmonica. All you need is a tune in your head, because in some ways it is much like humming or whistling. In just a short time, everything clicks and it becomes as natural as whistling. You just sing your music through your harmonica without thinking about the numbered holes and whether you blow or draw.
page.imageCaption: Discover why we say anyone can learn harmonica.

page.title: 'Ukulele (Hāna)

meta.description: Learn how to play the 'ukulele.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, ukulele, Portuguese, 19th century, chords, song, lū'au, luau, instrument, Noe Noe, gift shop.

page.copy: First introduced to Hawaiians by the Portuguese in the 19th century, the ‘Ukulele is now more well known as a Hawaiian instrument. You’ll learn basic chords, and before long, you’ll be playing a well-known song. We’ll send you home with sheet music, a little bit of history about the ‘Ukulele, and we even sell small ‘Ukulele in our Noe Noe gift shop—just in case you want to serenade family and friends at your next lū‘au.

page.title: Stargazing (Austin)

meta.description: Discover the wonderment of the night sky and learn the stories the stars have to share.
meta.keywords: travaasa, stargazing, sky, stars, austin

page.copy: Many of us dwell in cities and rarely experience the wonderment of the night sky or learn the stories the stars have to share. Stargazing has an inextricable link to romance—it’s got all the essential components: mystery, pursuit and ultimate discovery. It’s an activity that is easily shared by couples, families and friends. Join us on this relaxing journey that’s nothing more complex than looking up at the stars and exploring, yet it can open up your mind to a whole new dimension.
page.imageCaption: Stargazing - mystery, pursuit, discovery.

page.title: Ecology (Hāna)

meta.description: Explore and discover one of the world's richest and most diverse environments in a thrilling journey around Hāna.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, hawaii, canoe plants, taro, biodiversity, native flora

page.copy:
The beauty and biodiversity of Hawai’i is unlike anywhere else on Earth. The islands form the most remote archipelago on earth, 2,500 miles from the nearest land mass. The native flora and fauna developed in isolation in the rich, volcanic soil, with new species occasionally arriving by accident via wind, water or wings. Early explorers also contributed, bringing plants and seeds endemic to their own culture. We invite you to learn more about Hawaii’s ecological wonders and discover yet another reason why it’s recognized the world over as paradise.

Canoe Plants/Taro

The story of these unique plants begins 1,300 years ago when Polynesian explorers loaded their canoes with a precious cargo of plants, shoots and seeds. These explorers not only had to sustain themselves throughout the journey, but it was very wise to bring a “taste of home” since they had no idea what awaited them. Now you have the opportunity to explore the property and learn how Hawaiians have used these unique plants to define their way of life. Plants like taro, believed to have the greatest life force of all foods. 

Garden Walk

Join us for a journey around the beautiful Travaasa property as we learn about the lush plants and flowers that adorn our grounds, the rich history of the resort and the very special town and people of Hāna.

Tidal Pools

Join us on an ecological excursion to discover the marine life in the tidal pools of Hāna. On our exploration we’ll visit several different pools on the reef, each with a different ecosystem. We’ll take a look at a few of the undersea creatures native to Hawaii such as eels, crustaceans, and mollusks and examine early marine development. Finally, you’ll learn about the cultural importance of the ocean in sustaining the Hawaiian people while understanding traditional gathering practices and food customs.

page.title: Fitness

meta.description: Travaasa fitness focuses on balance, core work and flexibility.
meta.keywords: fitness, strengthening, balance, core, flexibility, agile, strength, travaasa

page.copy:
Strengthening the body is as important as keeping our brain cells active, fueling your inner muse and letting your spirit soar. Oh, and having a good time along the way is also key. Our fitness Travaasas focus on balance, core work and flexibility—so throw your clunky shoes off and let your agile inner child shine. We’ll pump up your heart so you can practically feel the good health coursing through your veins.

We’re not promising miracles, but we just bet you’ll leave here feeling new strength in muscles you didn’t even know you had.
page.imageCaption: Let your inner agile child shine with our Fitness Travaasas.

page.title: Coastal Workout (Hāna)

meta.description: Enjoy a great full-body workout that feels even better with the Pacific Ocean as a backdrop.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, full-body, coastal workout, infinity pool

page.copy: Tired of exercising in a dark, enclosed gym that forces you to work out and then get in your cardio? Our coastal workout allows you to experience both at the same time as you walk along the stunning Pacific Ocean. You'll be carrying a sand-filled "pack" that intensifies your jog and serves as your resistance for a full-body workout. After you get done with this experience you'll be ready to grab a smoothie and relax by the infinity pool.

page.title: Mechanical Bull Riding Workout

meta.description: Travaasa mechanical bull riding workout focuses on the engagement of core abdominal, back and thigh muscles.
meta.keywords: mechanical bull riding, core, abdominal, back and thigh muscles, Travaasa, balance

page.copy: You probably didn’t see this one coming, but you are in Austin, after all. After you’ve gotten your muscles primed with pilates or our core conditioning Travaasa, graduate to our mechanical bull for a core workout that’s unlike anything you’ve ever experienced. Riding the bull increases strength and improves flexibility because it’s continually moving—up, down, right and left—purposely keeping you off-balance. It’s a ride that forces you to use your leg muscles to grip the sides of the bull, and your core muscles to flex as you move forward and back. And lastly, form does count, so don’t forget to raise one arm up in the air to maintain your balance (bonus points if you have a cowboy hat). And you thought cowboys were just being cool waving their hats around in the air!
page.imageCaption: The ultimate core workout.

page.title: Martial Arts Conditioning (Hāna)

meta.description: A fun workout that uses the principles of many different martial arts.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, martial arts, Pacific, Hawai’I, Hawaiian, heart rate, workout, lua.

page.copy: Kick stress’s gluteus maximus with a class that will get your heart rate pumping. This fun workout uses the principles of many different martial arts disciplines (that’s only natural when you consider Hawai’i is the crossroads of the Pacific). We’ll even delve into the ancient Hawaiian art of self-defense called lua. Back in the day, skilled warriors knew around 300 moves that they used with devastating effect.

page.title: Yoga for Mind and Body (Austin)

meta.description: Travaasa yoga classes to heal, detoxify and unify mind and body.
meta.keywords: yoga, vinyasa, heal, detoxify, unify, healthy, Travaasa, austin

page.copy:
Yoga is a wonderful technique to heal, detoxify and unify your mind and body. It can help fortify your awareness of movement, balance and intention, in addition to strengthening your body (through vinyasa yoga). No matter your age, strength or flexibility level, anyone can do yoga with the right attitude and the right teacher. And if you are new to yoga, you’ll find a physical path that harmonizes mind, body and soul. Yoga combines physical activity with breath to reduce stress, control weight, relieve lower back pain and enhance focus. Our yoga classes include various styles and routines that create a dynamic, challenging program which combines strength, spirituality and a healthy dose of sweat.

Yoga: Aquatic

Practicing yoga in the water can provide a number of benefits. First of all, it feels great. The wiggly-waggly way water feels when you bend and stretch will have you experiencing childhood again. But water also acts as a safeguard against injuries that are more likely to occur on land. Your movements become smoother in water and therefore your body will not experience the same strain as on terra firma. There are a few poses which are even easier practiced in water, such as the standing eagle pose or tree pose. You can perform these effortlessly in water because the ripples that are created in the water force your body to maintain the necessary pose.

Yoga: Awakening the Joints

This is a “must-do” Travaasa if you sometimes feel aches and pains in your ankles, knees, elbows, wrists, shoulders and hips. And if you’re over the age of 30, you know what we mean. In this class we focus on yoga postures and stretches to bring greater movement to the body through awakening and stimulating stiff joints. And all without having to dip into the Glucosamine and Chondroitin.

Yoga: Bhava

Envisoned by Travaasa yoga expert Susan Anderson, Bhava yoga invites us to connect with the world beyond ourselves. The word Bhava loosely translates as "An expansion of feeling and sentiment in the heart through song and chant" and Bhava can transform you, but it calls for the surrender of your ego and sense of self. Join us for a unique yoga experience that will alter the way you think about yoga.

Yoga: Hatha (All Levels)

Wake up your body and mind with this flowing yoga practice that accommodates all levels of practitioners. Energize yourself with traditional morning Sun Salutations (a linking of breath and motion) and other Hatha yoga poses. This is a low-to-moderate-intensity class, geared toward everyone with an interest in yoga, and will allow those who are newer to take their time, while letting seasoned practitioners pick up the intensity.

Yoga: Spine Work

One of the most important factors in maintaining a healthy body is a flexible spine. Yogis say that youth is determined by the flexibility of your spine (which means, with a physically sound spine, 50 might really be the new 30). Lower back pain and upper back stress are some of the most common health complaints of adults. The best way to avoid backaches is to take care of your spine on a daily basis. There is no quick fix for back pain, but our exercise set is an effective maintenance program. In this Travaasa we practice a combination of back bends and forward bends to strengthen and bring flexibility to the spine. We will also learn some gentle stretches you can do on your own to relieve and prevent back pain.

Yoga: Bar

Combining the best of both worlds, the flowing movements of dance with the meditative qualities of yoga, this slow, ballet-bar based yoga was designed by Travaasa Austin's resident yogi Susan Anderson to provide an experience that draws from both yoga fundamentals and the movements and principles or dance. Bar Yoga will rejuvenate your body, mind and soul.
page.imageCaption: Yoga heals, detoxifies and unifies your mind and body.

page.title: Outdoor Circuit (Hāna)

meta.description: Outdoor workout at Travaasa that gives you maximum results in minimum time by mixing up moves and changing intensity.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, intervals, circuit training, fitness, challenge, body, mind, workout, exercise, beach.

page.copy: Get ready to go through some tough intervals that make your heart rate soar. Circuit training delivers maximum results in a minimum amount of time while promoting all-around fitness. We’ll challenge your body and your mind as we mix up the moves and the intensity of the workout to keep you motivated - all the while being surrounded by 360˚ views of stunning scenery. But what makes our circuit unlike any other is that we’ll exercise using the natural landmarks around our beautiful Hāna property. And our circuit wouldn’t be complete if we didn’t hit the beach!

page.title: Simplified Fitness (Austin)

meta.description: A class that provides exercise tips and tricks that allow you to work out anywhere and anytime.
meta.keywords: travaasa, simplified, fitness, tips, tricks, exercise, workout, austin

page.copy: This workout gets rid of the weights and machines and takes you through an intense program using only your body’s resistance and the earth’s gravity. Learn tips and tricks that will allow you to work out anywhere and anytime. You’ll be surprised by the large number of exercises you will learn that will allow you to focus on any area of your body. Travelers for both business and pleasure love this "portable" workout.
page.imageCaption: Learn a portable workout.

page.title: Yoga (Hāna)

meta.description: Travaasa yoga classes heal, detoxify and unify mind and body.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, vinyasa yoga, awareness, reduce stress, control weight, harmonize, heal, detoxify, unify body and mind, asana, yin, physical activity, hatha, sun salutations, breath, motion, gentle yoga.

page.copy:
Yoga at Travaasa Hāna is unlike yoga anywhere else in the world. Our instructors bring years of training and knowledge, our yoga classes are varied and unique, and the location (outdoor or in our open-air Wellness Center) will reinvigorate you with its sheer beauty and calm. It’s widely known that yoga is a wonderful technique to heal, detoxify and unify your mind and body. It can help fortify your awareness of movement, balance and intention, in addition to strengthening your body (through vinyasa yoga). No matter your age, strength or flexibility level, anyone can do yoga with the right attitude and the right teacher. And if you are new to yoga, you’ll find a physical path that harmonizes mind, body and soul. Yoga combines physical activity with breath to reduce stress, control weight, relieve lower back pain and enhance focus. 

Basic

A peaceful form of exercise helping you increase flexibility, strength, balance and inner awareness.  Connecting breath and body movement that will enhance each posture as you relax and inhale the tropical warmth of Hāna's fresh air and rejuvenating powers.  All levels are welcome.

Inner Landscape

This soft, gentle yoga experience is designed to help you open your body and mind. Move into unique postures designed to emulate the distinctive, varying landscapes of Hawaii as you focus on your senses and soak in the beauty of Hāna.

Gentle Hatha

Hatha may be the most common form of yoga practiced by Westerners, but practicing it in Hāna elevates it to an uncommonly spectacular level. We’ll start with traditional Sun Salutations (a linking of breath and motion) and other Hatha yoga poses. First timers are invited to join more seasoned practitioners. This is a class aimed at everyone and moves at a pace you’re comfortable with. And really, what’s the hurry? The goal is to energize your body and mind. 

Yin

If you’re a yoga practitioner, you may be doing only one part the asana practice. Challenge yourself with the slower, gentler discipline of Yin Yoga. Some consider it the original form of asana practice that is now being “re-discovered” by students. Yin practitioners can remain in postures from one to an amazing twenty minutes because it targets the connective tissues. These are the ligaments, bone and joints of the body that are not exercised much in other forms of yoga. Yin strengthens the hips and lower back and increases the flow of energy, allowing you to sit for long periods in contemplative meditation. This class is open everyone with an interest in yoga. 

Flow

Challenge your body and mind with a Vinyasa flow style class. Vinyasa yoga focuses on integrating breath with movement, awareness with alignment and strength with flexibility. In this class you will explore how individual yoga postures and sequences work together by creating a smooth series of postures that run together and seem to flow like a rhythmic dance.

Spine

Yogis say youth is determined by the flexibility of your spine: if we can keep a healthy spine, the rest of the body follows suit. In this class we will practice a combination of back bends and forward bends to strengthen and bring flexibility to the spine. Lower back pain and upper back stress are some of the most common health complaints of adults. The best way to avoid backaches is to take care of your spine on a daily basis. Here we will also learn some gentle stretches you can do on your own to relieve and prevent back pain. There are no quick fixes for back pain, but this exercise set is an effective maintenance program.

page.title: Barre (Austin)

meta.description: Travaasa barre exercises lengthen, strengthen and create lean dancer muscles.
meta.keywords: travaasa, barre, exercises

page.copy: Barre exercises are based in the movements and training habits of premier dancers. But luckily for you, you don’t have to be a dancer to reap the benefits of barre exercises. A high energy, unique fitness experience that takes place both on a traditional ballet bar and with floor based exercises, Barre sculpts muscles to become longer, leaner and stronger. And who doesn’t want that?
page.imageCaption: Sculpt your muscles to become longer and leaner.

page.title: Coastal Walk & Stretch (Hāna)

meta.description: A good morning is redefined as you take a morning walk along the gorgeous Hāna coastline and complete a light workout that leaves you refreshed and energized.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, maui, coastal walk, coastline, stretch

page.copy: Start your day with a walk along the beautiful Maui coastline. You’ll stop frequently along the way to take in breathtaking natural features as you wake your body for the day ahead. We’ll teach you a non-static technique known active isolated stretching that helps improve circulation, increase the elasticity of muscle and fascia, develop joint range of motion and reduce stress.

page.title: Zumba (Austin)

meta.description: Tone your body and whittle your abs using Latin dance, hip-hop, belly dancing and Reggaeton.
meta.keywords: travaasa, zumba, dance, tone, abs, dancing, workout, interval, austin

page.copy: The word Zumba is Colombian slang for “buzz like a bee” or “move very fast.” This Travaasa uses Latin dance, hip-hop, belly dancing and Reggaeton (a form of Latin hip-hop) choreography to tone the body and whittle abs, all while feeling like you are at a dance party… not sweating through a workout. Interval training keeps the body at an efficient and consistent fat-burning level throughout. Zumba’s slogan is “Ditch the workout. Join the party!” which makes it the perfect workout for the exercise-resistant.
page.imageCaption: Tone your body while feeling like you're at a dance party.

page.title: Core Conditioning (Hāna)

meta.description: Travaasa core work tones abs, lower back and glutes, and improves balance.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, core, muscles, tone, abs, glutes, lower back, workout, balance, stability balls, mana.

page.copy: Mana is a divine spiritual power or energy. It’s a power that comes from within flowing through all of us and giving us the power to do what we believe we can do. So it’s no small wonder that our 30-minute core class will make you feel like you can conquer the world. You just have to believe. Tone your abs, lower back and glues in this intense workout. You’ll improve core strength, balance and total body function using stability balls and gravity-resistant exercises.

page.title: Pilates (Austin)

meta.description: Transform the way your body looks, feels and performs without building excess bulk.
meta.keywords: travaasa, pilates, strength, posture, flexibility, agility, austin

page.copy: There’s nothing else like Pilates to make you feel like you’ve gained five inches in height or have the poise of a ballerina. Pilates is designed to transform the way your body looks, feels and performs, building strength without excess bulk. This basic all-level Pilates class on the mat teaches awareness, good posture and easy, graceful movement, while improving flexibility and agility.
page.imageCaption: Build strength without excess bulk.

page.title: Spa & Wellness

meta.description: Travaasa spa workshops include meditation, stretch, posture and breath work.
meta.keywords: wellness, meditation, stretch, health, workshops, travaasa, spa

page.copy: Wellness is a well-rounded thing. A balanced state of mind coupled with a managed stress life, a healthy body and a satisfied soul gives focus and a point of view to our lives. We achieve that through meditation, stretch, yoga, posture and breath work. Not to mention stimulating health-oriented consultations that will pique your curiosity. Think of these workshops as a wellness toolkit you’ll be able to refer to again and again after you leave here.
page.imageCaption: These Travaasas are like a wellness toolkit.

page.title: Meditation (Hāna)

meta.description: Meditation starts with guided practice and the use of chakra points to learn acceptance and letting go.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, Hawaiian, candelight, meditation, yoga, chakra

page.copy: In this Travaasa, we help demystify the ancient practice of meditation—bringing awareness to our moment-to-moment experiences. This simple—but not easy—practice of acceptance, letting go, non-striving and suspension of the judgmental mind leaves us with a deep sense of openness and receptivity to ourselves, to others and to the moment as it unfolds.

page.title: Chi Movement (Austin)

meta.description: THE TRAVAASA Chi movement classes has components from Tai Chi, Chi Gong and I Chi Flow to teach relaxation, health and self-defense moves.
meta.keywords: chi, movement, travaasa, austin

page.copy: This class explores the principles of Chi Movement by incorporating key components of Tai Chi, Chi Gong, and I Chi Flow. Introduce your body and mind to the concept of "moving meditation" exercise that has benefits for relaxation, health and self-defense. Unlike calisthenics, this integral movement enhances life energy slowly by progressively making the body more flexible and improving overall health.
page.imageCaption: Find balance and release.

page.title: Hā Breath (Hāna)

meta.description: Hā is an ancient ritual that promotes a general sense of well-being and enriches mind, body and spirit.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, hā, ha, mind, body, spirit, coastline, Pacific, yoga, experience, balance.

page.copy: Hā means breath—the source of life. Clearly this class enriches your mind, body and spirit the island way. In the most natural way possible, the tradition of Hā shows you how easily tension is released and self-imposed barriers broken when you simply relax and allow your body, and your world, to work. Our tranquil setting offers stunning views of the incredible lush greens that surround our property and the deep, blue Pacific. Whether you’re a novice or yoga expert you’ll enjoy our Hā experience.

page.title: Meditation (Austin)

meta.description: Meditation starts with guided practice and the use of chakra points to learn acceptance and letting go.
meta.keywords: travaasa, meditation, guided, chakra, austin

page.copy:
Meditation is a wonderful way to decompress after a stressful day—or to start your day in a calming state of mind. We offer three different points of view on meditation, and all are easy to learn and incorporate into your daily life.

Meditation: Wake-Up

Start your morning with a meditation experience designed to get your day off to a balanced start.

Meditation: Chakra

Within our bodies there are focal points of energy that we use (whether consciously or unconsciously), to allow us to fully experience and realize events that unfold before us. These focal points of energy are called Chakras. The word Chakra is Sanskrit for "wheel," and there are seven primary Chakra points in the body—each like a moving wheel of energy, ready to help you tune out, and tune into yourself. When one of the chakra centers is out of balance, it effects other centers. When one chakra center is out of balance, you are out of balance. Balance the chakra centers through meditation, and you will feel balanced throughout your day.

Meditation: Guided

In this Travaasa, we help demystify the ancient practice of meditation—bringing awareness to our moment-to-moment experiences. This simple—but not easy—practice of acceptance, letting go, non-striving and suspension of the judgmental mind leaves us with a deep sense of openness and receptivity to ourselves, to others and to the moment as it unfolds.
page.imageCaption: Relax, renew, discover yourself.

page.title: Chi Movement (Hāna)

meta.description: Chi Movement is a moving meditation exercise.
meta.keywords: travaasa, Hāna, hana, I Chi Flow, Tai Chi, Chi Gong, meditation, Hawaiian.

page.copy: This class has a decidedly Hawaiian vibe to it. It’s not about sweating and puffing. Instead, it focuses on feeling calm, refreshed and energized by incorporating key components of Tai Chi, Chi Gong and I Chi Flow. Introduce your body and mind to the concept of “moving meditation” exercise. Unlike calisthenics, this integral movement enhances life energy slowly by progressively making the body more flexible and improving overall health.

page.title: Breath Work (Austin)

meta.description: Breath work at Travaasa releases us from stress and anxiety to bring a calmer, more relaxed state.
meta.keywords: travaasa, restorative, breathing, breath, stress, anxiety, calm, austin

page.copy: Who knew that focusing on something we do unconsciously every second of every day can do so much more for us? This Travaasa works with the breath, following its movements through the body. Restorative sequencing moves us slowly into a deep somatic experience to release us from stress and anxiety and bring a calmer, more relaxed state (great for type-A personalities who have trouble relaxing). As we turn the lens inward, we will learn more about the asana—the breath—and ourselves.
page.imageCaption: Great for Type-A personalities who have trouble relaxing.

page.title: Mini Med School (Austin)

meta.description: Travaasa Mini Med classes feature talks about dentistry, dermatology, immunology, circulation, neurology and the central nervous system.
meta.keywords: med, medical, medicine, school, education, travaasa, austin

page.copy:
Our MiniMed Series takes a whole body approach to the largest organ in the body—the skin—and to circulation and the central nervous system. A fascinating look at how what happens inside of us affects our outside. This Travaasa teaches us to look for our internal smiles. You'll learn about the interworkings, mechanics and relations within the human body, and what you’ll discover will even alter the very way in which you look in the mirror. Specifically, how each face tells a story of what is happening inside the body. You'll learn simple yet effective steps you can take to look and feel better-sans pills, chemicals or complicated recipes. Fountain of youth, move over.

On any given week, we will explore one of the three following areas:

  • Dentistry/Dermatology
  • Immunology/Circulation
  • Neurology/The Central Nervous System
page.imageCaption: Outer beauty, inner health - discover at our Mini-Med Travaasas.
